extracted.name: P: Casual Listener — wants a fun, low-pressure way to sing along without needing talent
extracted.text: P: Casual Listener — wants a fun, low-pressure way to sing along without needing talent

extracted.name: P: Karaoke Host — wants to start a session fast and invite friends with minimal setup

extracted.name: P: Friend Participant — wants to join instantly from an invite link and know what to do next

extracted.name: P: Competitive Singer — wants scoring, stats, and bragging rights (optional mode)

extracted.name: P: Social Sharer — wants clips/screenshots/results to share after the session

extracted.name: P: Privacy-Conscious User — wants control over microphone use and recording, with clear consent

extracted.name: G: Let users sing along with synchronized lyrics for any supported song

extracted.name: G: Make joining a friend session effortless via link

extracted.name: R: Karaoke mode must display real-time synchronized lyrics with highlighting

extracted.name: R: Host can create a karaoke session from a song

extracted.name: R: Lobby must show who joined and who is ready

extracted.name: R: Users can mute/unmute themselves during the session

extracted.name: R: Users can leave session at any time without breaking the session

extracted.name: R: App must request microphone permission only when needed and explain why

extracted.name: R: App must handle network latency gracefully (allow slight desync + reconnection)
